name: Melify Inc.
overview:
We have built a reputation for excellence by providing a flexible portfolio of consultancy, research and design to the leading producers of interactive systems. Now in our ninth year, we are expanding our services and tools for clients in order to help them realise even more value by understanding even more about their end users. We are a wholly independent, privately owned company. Organisations, their projects and their products are radically different. We have no preferred approach other than a firm belief that the more you systematically build an understanding of your users into your designs, the better these designs will aid your business goals. We engage in a different way with each client, and recommend different activities to get the best results. We are often complimented that we understand more about our clients’ domains than they do themselves. Our consultancy team is highly focused in the following areas: Usability User Centered Design High-Fidelity Prototyping System and Usability Testing

Benefits in getting us involved

Help you integrate Usability and User Centered Design best practices into your environment Design High-Fidelity prototypes to ease communications and development Help you understand new technologies and how to best use them Help you in the software tools selection process that fits your team’s expertise Setup usability goals, test scenarios and an environment to fit your organization Help lower development and maintenance cost and time up to 75%
